p: To determine the number of cells per well, cells subjected to WST-1 assay as described above were immediately fixed and nuclei stained by incubation with 3.7% formaldehyde containing 10 Î¼g/ml of Hoechst for 1 h. The solution was replaced with PBS and the number of nuclei per well was quantified using the Acumen eX3 Cytometer (TTP Labtech).
